categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the New Jedi Order

nodes.text: Loli was a Jedi Knight. In 40 ABY, while still a teenager and just back from the Jedi Trials, Loli was among the Jedi who were present at the Ossus Academy when the Galactic Alliance Guard—GAG—attempted to secure it, holding the students hostage. Loli was on guard duty when GAG Major Salle Serpa moved against the Jedi, and was killed by snipers.
